Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: I had a really bad experience in this bar. The atmosphere was nice, but the owner was really rude to us, just because we were international students.  DO NOT GO In this bar if you're under 40 and not Dutch .

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Very nice local bar. We were at the bar twice, the first night they served small cheese snacks. Lots of locals having a drink here - and there is nice choice of beer on tap.

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Great for a few beers from draft. Typical local Amsterdam bar without any attempt to be pretentious.

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: The best place

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: A nice and cozy cafe. Good range of beers. Friendly staff.

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Such a nice, cozy cafe, the word 'local' really springs to mind. The atmosphere is very relaxed. The woman who served us, I presume she's the owner, was very friendly and helpful. It's not a big place, it's just good.

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Rude service. Probably because we were not locals. The lady was insisting to keep the door right next to us open even if it was freezing cold outside. When we asked to close it she just ignored us and kept it open. She also got worried that we will leave without paying although we were standing in the queue waiting to pay..

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Apple pie and beer, why not? Seems like the type of place frequented by the locals. Great place to just sit and have a couple beers. For Belgian Blonde fans that Brugse Zot, a couple of good lambics, and a Jopen IPA. Stay away from the Brand beers, they are not good.

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: International neighbourhood cafe with wonderful staff and great terrace.A dozen or so different beers   on draft.Speciality : toasty with cheese and ... os se worst (raw beef,ox sausage ).

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Brilliant wee bar, very nice owner and clientele, one guy helped us out when our cards were not accepted, (be careful this a common thing in Amsterdam, there is some card machines don't except certain visa) üôÇ

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
Review Text: Nice local bar. Friendly staff that makes you feel welcome. Well worth a visit.

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier

Name: Caf√© Scharrebier
